name: Croupier simulator
description:
First day as a croupier eh ? Well... i'm sure you'll do just fine. Controls:

You'll use exclusively the mouse to play.

Press F to toggle fullscreen (desktop versions).

The team:
  • Hernz (@LoukaSoret)
Tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.4.4
  • 2D: inkscape
  • Sound: Audacity

Every asset (except a few listed below) has been made during the jam. I tried to use the most open-source tools as possible.

External assets used:
  • Kenney's boardgame pack
  • Kenney's casino audio pack
  • Casino ambiance by MihirFreeSound
  • Beautiful drape sprite by PatteDeCanaard (@PatteDeCanaard)
